channel.title: Umm, OKay?! FIXED!

item.title: Umm, OKay?! FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Okay, I added this under my boolean process:

[code] update();
{
sendQuest("@red@Kills: " +killcount, 3985);
sendFrame126("@bla@Players Online: @red@" +PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),174);

}[/code]

So that it actually updates the players and killstats right away… But now, when I go on, when ever you try to walk somewhere you just run randomly and go on noclip… then you disconnect… WTF? Any1 know why?

NVM! FIXED! I removed the
update();
{}…

Read full topic
